Description_lang: Allari has long since mastered the blood elven crystals used to trap and manipulate fel energies. She uses the Scythe of Souls to reap the demonic in unthinkable ways - the information and power she's extracted has already proven invaluable numerous times in key battles against the Legion. Tired with the Illidari's lack of progress against stopping the flow of demons into Azeroth, Allari seeks someone new to follow who can put her power to proper use.
